issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
The {{HistoryFileManager.mkdir()}} code handles the path existing simply by logging that the dir exists, and returning for everything else to work.

There's a big assumption there: that the path resolves to a directory. A check needs to be made that this assumption is valid -throwing some IOE subclass if it's just a file
fields.summary: HistoryFileManager.mkdir() doesn't handle case where dest path exists -and is a file
